In case you rode the short bus and this all reads like a bunch of secret code, I’ll spell it out for you: Animatria.com is a premium porn animation, art and game site run by the very animators, artists and game developers whose work is showcased. Some of the bigger porn cartoon sites out there amount to a bunch of middlemen gouging a cut from the content they had nothing to do with, so this is really going to appeal to fans of the genre who’d like to support the artists more directly. It’s a fairly new site, popping up in 2024, but has steadily been building its collection and its fanbase.

The quality is super fucking high on every bit of CG or hand-drawn smut I see out front. There are porn animation sites out there that’ll publish damn near anything, including big-titted stick figures brought to life by outdated and potentially dangerous platforms like Flash. (Seriously, low-grade sex animations and porn games are the only places I still see Flash used at all.) Animatria clearly has higher standards than most.

The professional quality of the work is a big selling point right from the jump, and I think you’re also going to love the content itself. This is some serious adults-only stuff, with all kinds of depravity, sexual activity and kinky fetishes. On the landing page alone, I see finger-cuffing threesomes, strap-on lovemaking, anal creampies, beach footjobs and a sexy bitch getting her twat pounded by a robot as the machine holds her upside down.

Perverse sex acts depicted in realistic CG or digital pen-and-ink are sexy enough, but you geeks are really going to love all the porno parodies going on here. That broad getting robot-fucked is none other than Rey from Star Wars, and that strap-on scene features characters from Life Is Strange. There’s explicit artwork with babes from Game of Thrones, Cowboy Bebop, Tomb Raider and Harry Potter, and I haven’t even made it off Animatria’s front page yet.

The good news is that Animatria.com memberships are pretty fucking cheap. Most paysites cost thirty bucks a month, but the rates here start at $20 with some bonus time tacked onto each plan. The regular 30-day membership actually starts with 6 weeks before you get the first rebill, and the $60, 180-day plan morphs into a $10 per month plan after 6 months.

Those low rates earn you a ticket for an absolute shit-ton of fappable content. They break down the numbers out front, and it’s really fucking impressive for a site that hasn’t even been around for a year. Animatria currently has more than 1000 movies, 1500 mangas, and their X-rated picture level is OVER 9000!

Their game selection is considerably slimmer, probably owing to the overall high quality that seems to be one of their main requirements. Still, they’ve got some nice-looking interactive smut for Windows, Mac and Linux. I recognize a couple of the games like TMNT: Mating Season and Star Channel, and I know they’re not exclusive to the site. I sometimes dock a few points for non-exclusive material on a paysite, which makes me wonder how much of Animatria.com’s content is available elsewhere. That said, the price is low enough and the collection big enough that I don’t think it’s going to be a dealbreaker for anyone.

Instead of dealbreakers, how about we discuss dealmakers? I feel like I’ve listed some pretty fucking strong perks already, but all the high-end porn manga and NSFW video game parodies ain’t worth a recurring membership if they never update the collection. The smarty-pants motherfuckers in the audience have probably already guessed how often they add new stuff, just based on those high content counts. Just in case there’s any confusion, though, they spell it out for you before you even get a chance to pull the trigger: Animatria.com is updated every day with fresh new clips.

Download XXX Animations and Support the Artists

Anyway, this brings me to the manga section. Again, the artwork is consistently professional, putting Animatria’s collection head and shoulders above the free and spammy hentai sites where they’ll publish anything they can scrape off of other websites. Most of their content is full-color on every page instead of just the cover, and a lot of them are nice and long. My first stop in the manga aisle was to check out a 24-page BDSM Avatar parody I saw out front. I don’t want to spoil anything, but it’s way better than anything James Cameron could ever dream up.

I knew Animatria’s videos were where I’d really fall down the rabbit hole and destroy my productivity for the day, so I saved the best for last. With over a thousand CG porn animations, I knew I’d be there for a while. We’re going to be living in the year 2024 in just a few days for now, so naturally, most of the movies are released in HD.

The one major downside, though, was that most of the animations are very short. When I’m reviewing premium porn sites with actual pornstars getting nailed, I tend to be annoyed when the clips run less than twenty minutes. I’d be thrilled to find 20-minute videos on any X-rated animation site, but it just isn’t going to happen. Even on a quality site like this, you’re lucky to get more than a couple of minutes. That’s just the nature of the art form.

Animatria.com lets its paid members download whatever the fuck they want. That’s definitely what I like to see on a paysite, though I have to wonder if some thieving cretin is going to sign up just to steal the whole collection for his free hentai/manga tube. Considering how many of those sites seem to be made of downloaded content, the collection here seems dangerously ripe for the picking.

I really hope that doesn’t happen, because one of the site’s best gimmicks is that it’s run by the actual content creators. These guys usually don’t earn shit off their dirty illustrated/animated fantasies, so Animatria gives fans an opportunity to give back by supporting those artists, animators and game designers more directly. Not only does it ensure they get a fair cut, but it means they can spend more time creating robot sex CG instead of driving Uber to make ends meet.

Animatria.com checks off all the boxes for a good porn animation and art site. Their high-quality and ever-expanding collection of CG movies, manga, and pics is going to be the biggest selling point for most users, with a price significantly below what you’d pay almost anywhere else. If you’re into freaky NSFW artwork, explicit comics and sexy parodies of your favorite games, movies and cartoons, you’re going to feel right at home.

data.detailedDescription:
Based on the name, Ero Bits sounds a little like it’d be a secret alphabet that’s only used to describe the filthiest of sex acts. That ain’t quite accurate, because the site is something else entirely, though it’s on the right track. This ain’t your typical vanilla tube full of blowjobs or the usual paysite stocked with horny lesbians galore. Nah, these guys are peddling the kind of smut that you don’t even tell your buddies about when you’re discussing your Tinder conquests. Well, not unless you already know your friends are as depraved as you are.

This is the 21st century, and most of us have become pretty jaded when it comes to hardcore penetration and cum-drenched orgy scenes. It all seems like business as usual sometimes, doesn’t it? The internet’s a superhighway of perversion, but EroBits.com has something even kinkier than most sites. It’s a platform where artists hawk their 3D porn comics, and man, they get pretty freaky. No wonder their traffic has been exploding over the last few months! Let’s see what everyone’s getting all hot and bothered about, shall we?

EroBits is Full of Naughty Bits

Typically, if I see CG futanaris and 3D monster sex, it’s on one of the free adult comic sites. Once I saw the price tags, I knew this wasn’t your typical library of whatever the hell they could scrape from the web. As much as I love those free sites, you don’t get much Original Content or exclusive material. Here, you can buy your comics right from artists themselves.

I’m sure there are some cheapskates in the audience right now thinking, “Well, I’ll just save a few bucks and shake my dick at one of the free sites.” You’re free to do that, and hell, I don’t even blame you. Groceries cost like twice what they did last year, making everyone’s porn budget a little skimpier. I do want to mention, though, that this is a great way to support independent porn comic artists. These guys tend to do this in their free time, and a few bucks can go a long way in ensuring more great content in the future.

EroBits.com currently has about a dozen artists creating, posting and selling their material on the site. Given the way their traffic has been blowing up lately, I imagine that number is going to grow rapidly. The domain here was registered way back in 2015, but the current iteration of the platform is a much newer thing. Give it time and I think we’ll see even more amazing, elaborately kinky things.

How Big of a Freak Are You?

EroBits.com has a kinky, freaky and unusual variety of perversion on offer. This is one of very few sites where the kinksters have more to choose from than folks who like regular ol’ sucking and fucking. They have the catalog broken into a handful of broad categories: BDSM, Fantasy, Futanari, Hardcore, Monsters, Parody and Sci-Fi.

    

Their Parody aisle is well worth a look for anybody who wants to see their favorite characters in scandalous situations. They’ve got parodies of a nice range of movies, comics and video games. Game of Thrones, Avatar, X-Men, Tomb Raider and Mortal Kombat are just a few of the properties that have gotten the X-rated treatment around here. I know Snow White is technically a public-domain fairy-tale character, but that’s the dress she’s wearing in the Disney version.

If I have just one complaint about the setup, I wish they included more in the way of traditional tagging. They have a handful of browsable subcategories like Femdom, Futa on Futa, and Monster Girls, but they rarely seem to get into the usual spread of porno niches like Lesbian, Blowjobs, Anal or Feet. The EroBits search function is hit or miss depending on what tags have actually been included. In a lot of cases, the search results come from sifting through descriptions, not tags.

On the same note, I wish they had a full, browsable tags index. Given the style of content and all the deep-niche fetishism on offer, I think EroBits.com would benefit from the kind of sprawling tags index you find on a hentai site. The catalog is still relatively small and easy enough to browse manually, but a better tagging system would help a lot as the library continues to grow.

Take a recently featured EroBits comic called Elven Fun, for example. It’s got exactly four tags: Fantasy, Monsters, Lesbian and Threesome. Just from looking at the sample pics and reading the description, I would have also tagged it with Blowjobs, Futa on Female, and Anal. When proper tagging goes underlooked, it’s the end masturbator who suffers because they can’t find what they’re looking for.

But How Do I Even Choose?

The good news is that, even at this early stage, you’ve got your pick of hundreds of 3D porn comics. Currently, the Monsters aisle is the most jam-packed, with around a hundred sordid tales of beasts and their human lovers. By contrast, the Hardcore section is one of the smallest, with 40 comics currently on the menu. I told you kinksters were in the majority here!

The big question is where to dive in. Obviously, you’ll make your way to your favorite section full of your preferred masturbatory content, but that still leaves most of you with a shitload of options. If you’re cost-oriented, it’s worth mentioning that EroBits comics start at just a few bucks. I saw a ton of them going for just under three bones, with pricier stories running closer to a tenner.

I do wish they had a few more search filters, because that would help make your smut-buying decisions easier. A price filter would be nice, as would a method of searching by length. I don’t mind paying more if I’m getting a big bang for my buck, which may be the case with some of the longer 3D porn comics in the catalog. As the site continues to grow, a language filter might be useful in cultivating a more global audience. You can view the site in a huge number of languages, similar to MissAVDH, but all the current comics seem to be in English.

The search options may be a little bit lacking, but at least they offer up a fair amount of free samples. I clicked through to check the listing for a three-dollar comic called Dominate: Houseguest. It’s a 54-page BDSM tale of femdom and voyeurism with a MILF as the star. The quartet of sample pics show that MILF handcuffing a dude, sitting on his face and more. “I am putting those around your wrists so that you could not move and disobey me.” Kinky!

EroBits.com has some minor issues with the organization of their catalog, but the catalog itself is fucking stellar. They carry 3D comics in some truly rare porn niches, from a growing stable of talented artists who bring all kinds of depravity to the table. If you love this stuff and you want to support the artists who make it, EroBits is one of the best places to get your fix.
